_comment: Copyright: Copyright (C) 2012-2016 Netronome Systems, Inc.  All rights reserved.

0x00000008.description: PHY DevId constant from package parameter PHY_IDENTIFIER bits 15:4. Bits 3:0 always 0.
0x00000008.name: EthChPcsDeviceId0

0x0000000c.description: PHY DevId constant from package parameter PHY_IDENTIFIER bits 31:16.
0x0000000c.name: EthChPcsDeviceId1

0x00000010.description: PCS supported speeds (values as defined by standard only, no proprietary speeds).
0x00000010.name: EthChPcsSpeedAbility

0x00000038.description: Constant from package parameter PACK_IDENTIFIER bits 15:0.
0x00000038.name: EthChPcsPkgId0

0x0000003c.description: Constant from package parameter PACK_IDENTIFIER bits 31:0.
0x0000003c.name: EthChPcsPkgId1

0x00000050.description: EEE Control and Capabilities (exists only if EEE is available).
0x00000050.name: EthChPcsEeeCtrlCapability

0x00000058.description: EEE Wake error counter (exists only if EEE is available); Clears on read.
0x00000058.name: EthChPcsWakeErrorCounter

0x00000084.description: Link Status latches and error counters.
0x00000084.name: EthChPcsBaseRStatus2

0x00000088.description: 10G Base-R Test Pattern Seed A bits 15:0.
0x00000088.name: EthChPcsSeedA0

0x0000008c.description: 10G Base-R Test Pattern Seed A bits 31:16.
0x0000008c.name: EthChPcsSeedA1

0x00000090.description: 10G Base-R Test Pattern Seed A bits 47:32.
0x00000090.name: EthChPcsSeedA2

0x00000094.description: 10G Base-R Test Pattern Seed A bits 57:48.
0x00000094.name: EthChPcsSeedA3

0x00000098.description: 10G Base-R Test Pattern Seed B bits 15:0.
0x00000098.name: EthChPcsSeedB0

0x0000009c.description: 10G Base-R Test Pattern Seed B bits 31:16.
0x0000009c.name: EthChPcsSeedB1

0x000000a0.description: 10G Base-R Test Pattern Seed B bits 47:32.
0x000000a0.name: EthChPcsSeedB2

0x000000a4.description: 10G Base-R Test Pattern Seed B bits 57:48.
0x000000a4.name: EthChPcsSeedB3

0x000000a8.description: Test Pattern Generator and Checker controls.
0x000000a8.name: EthChPcsBaserTestControl

0x000000ac.description: Test Pattern Error Counter; Clears on read; None roll-over.
0x000000ac.name: EthChPcsBaserTestErrCnt

0x000000b0.description: BER High Order Counter of BER bits 21:6; None roll-over.
0x000000b0.name: EthChPcsBerHighOrderCnt

0x000000b4.description: Error Blocks High Order Counter bits 21:8; None roll-over.
0x000000b4.name: EthChPcsErrBlkHighOrderCnt

0x000000c8.description: Lane Alignment Status Bits and Block Lock.
0x000000c8.name: EthChPcsMultilaneAlignStat1

0x000000d0.description: Lane Alignment Marker Lock Status bits.
0x000000d0.name: EthChPcsMultilaneAlignStat3

0x00000320.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 0; Clears on read; None roll-over.
0x00000320.name: EthChPcsBipErrCntLane0

0x00000324.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 1; Clears on read; None roll-over.
0x00000324.name: EthChPcsBipErrCntLane1

0x00000328.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 2; Clears on read; None roll-over.
0x00000328.name: EthChPcsBipErrCntLane2

0x0000032c.description: BIP Error Counter Lane 3; Clears on read; None roll-over.
0x0000032c.name: EthChPcsBipErrCntLane3

0x00008004.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Core Revision derived from DEV_VERSION package parameter.
0x00008004.name: EthChPcsVendorCoreRev

0x00008008.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Set the amount of data between markers. (I.e. distance of markers-1).
0x00008008.name: EthChPcsVendorVlIntvl

0x0000800c.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Defines the transmit line decoupling FIFOs almost full threshold.
0x0000800c.name: EthChPcsVendorTxlaneThresh

0x00008010.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Define Reduced-XLAUI PMA mode using 2 lanes.
0x00008010.name: EthChPcsVendorRxlauiConfig

0x00008020.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Marker pattern for PCS Virtual Lane 0.
0x00008020.name: EthChPcsVendorVl00

0x00008024.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Last byte of PCS Virtual Lane 0 marker pattern.
0x00008024.name: EthChPcsVendorVl01

0x00008028.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Marker pattern for PCS Virtual Lane 1.
0x00008028.name: EthChPcsVendorVl10

0x0000802c.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Last byte of PCS Virtual Lane 1 marker pattern.
0x0000802c.name: EthChPcsVendorVl11

0x00008030.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Marker pattern for PCS Virtual Lane 2.
0x00008030.name: EthChPcsVendorVl20

0x00008034.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Last byte of PCS Virtual Lane 2 marker pattern.
0x00008034.name: EthChPcsVendorVl21

0x00008038.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Marker pattern for PCS Virtual Lane 3.
0x00008038.name: EthChPcsVendorVl30

0x0000803c.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Last byte of PCS Virtual Lane 3 marker pattern.
0x0000803c.name: EthChPcsVendorVl31

0x00008040.description: Vendor Specific Reg; Configure PCS supporting Clause 49 or 82 Encoder/Decoder, MLD.
0x00008040.name: EthChPcsVendorPcsMode

fields.description: Select Random Idle test pattern (40G); Overrides bits 1:0 when set.
fields.name: EthPcsSelectRandom

fields.description: Select Square Wave (1) or Pseudo Random (0) test pattern; 10G only.
fields.name: EthPcsSelectSquare

fields.description: Data Pattern Select: 1=all Zero, 0=2x Local Fault; 10G only.
fields.name: EthPcsDataPatternSel

fields.description: Test pattern error counter; Clears on read; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsCounter

fields.description: Bits 21:6 of BER counter; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsBerCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter lane 0; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsBipErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter lane 1; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsBipErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter lane 2; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsBipErrorCounter

fields.description: BIP error counter lane 3; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsBipErrorCounter

fields.description: PCS type selection; Writing 0 sets PCS_MODE to 0x03 setting Clause 49 mode and disabling MLD.
fields.name: EthPcsTypeSelection

fields.description: Bits 15:0 of Device DevId defined by parameter PHY_IDENTIFIER in PCS package file.
fields.name: EthPcsDevId

fields.description: Bits 31:16 of Device DevId defined by parameter PHY_IDENTIFIER in PCS package file.
fields.name: EthPcsDevId

fields.description: When 1, EEE deep sleep is supported for 40GBASE-R.
fields.name: EthPcsEee40GBaseRSleep

fields.description: When 1, EEE fast wake is supported for 40GBASE-R.
fields.name: EthPcsEee40GBaseRAwake

fields.description: Mode for selecting select 40G EEE mode; 1 = Fast wake mode; 0 = Deep sleep for LPI function.
fields.name: EthPcsLpiFw

fields.description: Bits 21:8 of Error Blocks counter; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsErroredBlocksCounter

fields.description: Lane alignment status; 1=All Receive lanes locked and aligned.
fields.name: EthPcsLaneAlignStatus

fields.description: Bits 15:0 of Package DevId defined by parameter PACK_IDENTIFIER in PCS package file.
fields.name: EthPcsDevId

fields.description: Bits 31:16 of Package DevId defined by parameter PACK_IDENTIFIER in PCS package file.
fields.name: EthPcsDevId

fields.description: 1: transmit is or was in LPI state;  0: normal operation; Latching high.
fields.name: EthPcsTxLpi

fields.description: 1: receive is or was in LPI state;  0: normal operation; Latching high.
fields.name: EthPcsRxLpi

fields.description: 1: transmit is currently in LPI state;  0: normal operation.
fields.name: EthPcsTxLpiActive

fields.description: 1: receive is currently in LPI state;  0: normal operation.
fields.name: EthPcsRxLpiActive

fields.description: When 1, indicates a fault condition idetected; When '0', indicates that no fault condition is detected.
fields.name: EthPcsFault

fields.description: When 1, indicates PCS receive link up; When '0', indicates PCS receive link is or was down (latching low).
fields.name: EthPcsRcvLinkStatus

fields.description: Set to 1 to indicate that the PCS implements a low power mode.
fields.name: EthPcsLowPowerAble

fields.description: Device present. When bits are 10 = device responding at this address.
fields.name: EthPcsDevPresent

fields.description: Transmit fault. 1=Fault condition on transmit path. Latched high
fields.name: EthPcsTransmitFault

fields.description: Receive fault. 1=Fault condition on receive path. Latched high
fields.name: EthPcsReceiveFault

fields.description: Core Design version as defined by DEV_VERSION parameter in PCS package file.
fields.name: EthPcsRevision

fields.description: When 0 PCS 4-lane MLD function is active; When 1 the MLD function is disabled.
fields.name: EthPcsDisableMld

fields.description: When 0 PCS uses Clause 82 encoder/decoder functions; When 1 PCS uses Clause 49 encoder/decoder functions.
fields.name: EthPcsEnaClause49

fields.description: Indicates if currently the RXLAUI mode is enabled.
fields.name: EthPcsEnaStatus

fields.description: Set VL (0..3) to transmit to RXLAUI lane 1.
fields.name: EthPcsTxMapLane1

fields.description: Set VL (0..3) to transmit to RXLAUI lane 0.
fields.name: EthPcsTxMapLane0

fields.description: These bits are writeable but have no effect.
fields.name: EthPcsReservedWriteableBits

fields.description: Enable Reduced-XLAUI PMA mode using 2 lanes.
fields.name: EthPcsRxlauiEna

fields.description: Scratch Register; Register address to test read and write operation.
fields.name: EthPcsScratch

fields.description: A 4-bit value to define the transmit line decoupling FIFOs almost full threshold; Valid values are 4..9.
fields.name: EthPcsThreshold

fields.description: Lane 0 last btye of Marker pattern for m2.
fields.name: EthPcsM2

fields.description: Lane 1 last btye of Marker pattern for m2.
fields.name: EthPcsM2

fields.description: Lane 2 last btye of Marker pattern for m2.
fields.name: EthPcsM2

fields.description: Lane 3 last btye of Marker pattern for m2.
fields.name: EthPcsM2

fields.description: A 16-bit value defining the amount of data between markers; (distance of markers-1).
fields.name: EthPcsMarkerCounter

fields.description: Increments each time the LPI enters the RX_WTF state indicating a wake time fault; None roll-over.
fields.name: EthPcsCounter
